Shareholder Name: Ahmad Hamad Al Gosaibi and Brothers
Saud Abdul Aziz Hamad Al Gosaibi

Description: Nama Chemicals is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since October 1998. It operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Switzerland, Bahrain, Germany and Saudi Arabia. Nama Chemicals is based in Jubail, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 1992.
